ComicInfo.Summary:
Death Watch!: Gil has a plan to scare Charlie to death and get his money.
Man in the Attic!: A strangler is loose in the city and the residents of a boarding house are quick to believe it is somebody living there.
Curse of the Sea Hag!: Jerry sneaks aboard a cursed boat.
Voice in the Night: After a horrible car accident a man is haunted by the voice of his wife.
ComicInfo.Title: Death Watch!; Man in the Attic!; Curse of the Sea Hag!; Voice in the Night
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
